pkgmetadata.longdescription: Measuring Concreteness in Natural Language // Models for detecting concreteness in natural language. This package is built in support of Yeomans (2020) doi:10.17605/OSF.IO/DYZN6, which reviews linguistic models of concreteness in several domains. Here, we provide an implementation of the best- performing domain-general model (from Brysbaert et al., (2014) doi:10.3758/s13428-013-0403-5) as well as two pre-trained models for the feedback and plan-making domains.
